## Optional:

- [Data Analysis Using Regression and Multilevel/Hierarchical Models](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/052168689X/ref=as_li_qf_sp_asin_il_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=052168689X&linkCode=as2&tag=andrsblog0f-20&linkId=PX5B5V6ZPCT2UIYV) by Gelman A., and Hill, J.:
    + Section 6.2: Poisson regression, exposure, and overdispersion
    + Section 6.4: Probit regression: normally distributed latent data
    + Section 6.5: Ordered and unordered categorical regression

- [An Introduction to Categorical Data Analysis, Second Edition](https://www.amazon.com/Introduction-Categorical-Analysis-Probability-Statistics/dp/1119405262) by Alan Agresti:
    + Section 3.2.4: Probit Regression Model
    + Section 3.3: Generalized Linear Models for Count Data
    + Section 6: Multicategory Logit Models  
    *Download pdf versions of individual chapters, including this one, via Duke library [here](https://find.library.duke.edu/catalog/DUKE005142588). Let me know if you run into problems downloading the chapter.*
